"Pleased to make your acquaintance."
"There is a tutorial program made just for people like you... it's called the ARKS Road."
"This program is highly recommended for people who are not yet used to ARKS activities."

"As you fill in this stamp card, you should naturally learn more about ARKS."

"The first goal on this stamp card is to go meet Astarte.

"That's all for now. See you again.
I look forward to working together."
